scripts.install-all: concurrently "npm install" "cd ../home/ && npm install" "cd ../auth/ && npm install" "cd ../cart/ && npm install" "cd ../checkout/ && npm install" "cd ../products/ && npm install"
scripts.reinstall-all: concurrently "rm -rf node_modules package-lock.json && npm install" "cd ../home/ && rm -rf node_modules package-lock.json && npm install" "cd ../auth/ && rm -rf node_modules package-lock.json && npm install" "cd ../cart/ && rm -rf node_modules package-lock.json && npm install" "cd ../checkout/ && rm -rf node_modules package-lock.json && npm install" "cd ../products/ && rm -rf node_modules package-lock.json && npm install"
scripts.start-uitest: concurrently "npm start" "cd ../home/ && npm start" "cd ../products/ && npm start"
scripts.start-all: concurrently "npm start" "cd ../home/ && npm start" "cd ../auth/ && npm start" "cd ../cart/ && npm start" "cd ../checkout/ && npm start" "cd ../products/ && npm start"
scripts.start-all:live: concurrently "npm run start:live" "cd ../home/ && npm run start:live" "cd ../auth/ && npm run start:live" "cd ../cart/ && npm run start:live" "cd ../checkout/ && npm run start:live" "cd ../products/ && npm run start:live"
scripts.start-all:live-no-open: concurrently "npm run start:live-no-open" "cd ../home/ && npm run start:live-no-open" "cd ../auth/ && npm run start:live-no-open" "cd ../cart/ && npm run start:live-no-open" "cd ../checkout/ && npm run start:live-no-open" "cd ../products/ && npm run start:live-no-open"
